children.value: assignment. I did the original assignment in 2018. The original assignment was on Android app. I find this solar-system animation interesting because it was simple and fun to work. So, when I wanted to play around with Pixi.js, I decided to port solar system as exercise.

The original requirement was pretty simple. The earth needs to rotate the sun and the moon needs to rotate the earth. Additionally, I also added meteor shower button that can spawn pretty shooting stars that ricochet on screen.

I got to play around with few of Pixi.js API like Sprite. I was also able to experiment and practice OO paradigm on application like this. Currently, it’s only render properly on desktop browser. Unfortunately I didn’t got a chance to play around with more advance feature like Filter and Textured Mesh. I also think the current way it’s written can be better.

frontmatter.title: Solar System
frontmatter.description: Mini solar system visualization using pixi.js. Replica of Gojek's bootcamp solar system.
